inputs.name: admin
boot
cls
inputs.type:
object({
    node_type  = string
    node_cpu   = string
    nic_type   = string
    node_count = number
    public_ip  = bool
  })

inputs.name: clt
fsname
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: EXAScaler filesystem name, only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-8 characters long

inputs.name: image
local_mount
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: Mountpoint (at the client instances) for this EXAScaler system

inputs.name: mds
inputs.type:
object({
    node_type  = string
    node_cpu   = string
    nic_type   = string
    node_count = number
    public_ip  = bool
  })

inputs.name: mdt
mgs
inputs.type:
object({
    node_type  = string
    node_cpu   = string
    nic_type   = string
    node_count = number
    public_ip  = bool
  })

inputs.name: mgt
mnt
network_name
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: The name of the VPC network to where the system is connected.

inputs.name: network_properties
inputs.type:
object({
    routing = string
    tier    = string
    name    = string
    auto    = bool
    mtu     = number
    new     = bool
    nat     = bool
  })
inputs.description: Network properties. Ignored if network_name is supplied.

inputs.name: oss
inputs.type:
object({
    node_type  = string
    node_cpu   = string
    nic_type   = string
    node_count = number
    public_ip  = bool
  })

inputs.name: ost
project_id
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: Compute Platform project that will host the EXAScaler filesystem

inputs.name: security
inputs.type:
object({
    enable_local      = bool
    enable_ssh        = bool
    ssh_source_range  = string
    enable_http       = bool
    http_source_range = string
  })

inputs.name: service_account
inputs.description: Service account name used by deploy application

inputs.name: subnetwork_address
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: The IP range of internal addresses for the subnetwork

inputs.name: subnetwork_name
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: The name of the VPC subnetwork to where the system is connected.

inputs.name: subnetwork_properties
inputs.description: Subnetwork properties. Ignored if subnetwork_name is supplied.

inputs.name: waiter
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: Waiter to check progress and result for deployment.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.type: string
inputs.description: Compute Platform zone where the servers will be located

outputs.name: mount_command
outputs.description: Command to mount the file system.

outputs.name: network_storage
outputs.description: Describes a EXAScaler system to be mounted by other systems.

outputs.name: private_addresses
outputs.description: Private IP addresses for all instances.

outputs.name: ssh_console
outputs.description: Instructions to ssh into the instances.

outputs.name: web_console
outputs.description: HTTP address to access the system web console.
